documents.document: @BibRave A1 Yes it's fun because a lot of people dress up! It's also more of a fun run than a serious race which is great too. Don't have to take all races seriously :) And kids in costumes are super cute. #bibchat
@BibRave Hi it's Jeannine from Vancouver! Fave side dish is stuffing! Yum! #bibchat https://t.co/nCLyvETLZb

Happy to hear that @nuunhydration will be offered on course at the @VanFirstHalf in Feb! Excited to #stayhydrated and potentially leave the pack at home. Less weight! #teamnuun #nuunlife https://t.co/R5cmk4b2Gc
RT @CTVVancouver: A North Vancouver cyclist has done the equivalent of cycling up Mount Everest 33 times https://t.co/bdPtqzc1v8
RT @gscycling: Tune into @CTVVancouver today at 5pm and 6:10pm to see our own @pinkbartape on the news sharing his #1000000feet story! #gs…
Excited for people to see this inspiring story @pinkbartape @gscycling @CTVVancouver https://t.co/JdlZ5c0iL5

Last week I had the chance to run the @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas half marathon. Here's a recap of my full experience from expo until the finish line. Check it out! #StripatNight #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/nRFOKPl7Gu https://t.co/A1jHFCMkXi

If you're looking for new running headwear, check out @BocoGear - here's my review and as a proud owner of multiple #bocogear hats, it's very obvious what I think about them #bocolove #bibchat https://t.co/5PYRleYiNz

ICYMI I just blogged about the @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas half marathon. Find out what I loved about this race and some tips for next year. #StripatNight #bibchat #bibravepro #racereview #racerecap https://t.co/JhjWyzkxEZ https://t.co/o1pMMdVscL
I just reviewed @runrocknroll Las Vegas #RnRVegas #StripatNight on https://t.co/v1DnRrP4H0 - check it out! https://t.co/gnPFi8l7Tn #BibChat
Check out my blog about last weekend's epic Rock 'n' Roll Marathon Series Las Vegas Half Marathon #RnRVegas... https://t.co/mqTphklMAg

I just blogged about my @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas #StripatNight experience! Here's how I did and what I saw. Such an epic race. Hope to be back another time! #bibchat #bibravepro @BibRave https://t.co/KdcmbW5yc5 https://t.co/4Ce3nt4O7j
@nuunhydration Woohoo! I'll come say hi!
@nuunhydration hey! Will you be at Woodland Park CX this weekend? I remember seeing a tent last year but didn't get a chance to say hi. Coming back this year to watch. #teamnuun #nuunlife

Tomorrow is the last day to apply to become a 2018 @BibRave Pro! I love being a #BibRavePro - without it, I wouldn't have been able to experience epic races like @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas last weekend. If you love to run, blog & be social, join us! #bibchat https://t.co/kxut276Z6z https://t.co/XvQDE2CMJw

From the party street of @RunRocknRoll #rnrvegas #stripatnight to the serenity of the Grand Canyon. Thanks for a memorable weekend #lasvegas #arizona #grandcanyon #travel #adventure https://t.co/HkRaEd0em7
@LuisGarzam89 @RunRocknRoll Thank you!
@race_check @RunRocknRoll Thanks!
@MelissaKahn7 @RunRocknRoll Thank you!!
@ScottTDaley @RunRocknRoll I recommend it! Fun weekend!
@CristinaSchultz @RunRocknRoll Thank you!!! You should go! Big party!
@StampieRuns @RunRocknRoll I missed out on that. I just did one race each of those years.
@runningmomto1 @RunRocknRoll Me too! Very unique! #bibchat
@MIDAGEDRUNNER @RunRocknRoll Thank you!!
Easily one of my coolest medals. @RunRocknRoll #rnrvegas #stripatnight #bibchat #bibravepro #racebling https://t.co/79w2EduT5S
My last major race of the year has come and gone but will never be forgotten. Thank you @RunRocknRoll for an amazing event! #rnrvegas #stripatnight #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/7KlDBepdLh
.@RunRocknRoll #rnrvegas brings new and old friends together. So happy to be able to share this experience with so many fabulous people. #bibchat #bibravepro #stripatnight https://t.co/kcjfaDmNdh
Flat Jeannine is ready to @RunRocknRoll #stripatnight in my summer @BibRave gear. Gotta love Vegas! @BocoGear @BUFF_USA #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/54xGqUjYCW
Double brunch pre-@RunRocknRoll #rnrvegas with the @BibRave crew. So great chatting with everyone this morning! After that, met my mom for more fuelling 😂 #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/6IXej4gjsJ
@AlliJCollister @RunRocknRoll @BibRave @CGinPNW @SlackerRunner @Once_upon_a_run @MayTheCourseBWU So awesome to finally meet you all in person! Have a great race!! #bibchat
What a day! Thanks for the great expo @runrocknroll #rnrvegas ! Looking forward to a car-free #stripatnight tomorrow! #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/czfaQFL2lc
See you soon @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas !! Excited to party down the #StripatNight tomorrow but first, @googoodolls tonight!! #bibchat https://t.co/wK8mSFkuD5

Catching up on race recaps. Just posted my experience at the @SHLFoundation 10k run. I need a 2nd crack at this race. Congrats on raising $40,800 for your cause! #shlf #bibchat https://t.co/d49tdveZeu https://t.co/oBz9HosQOK
Catching up on race recaps. Here's how my experience went at the Strachan Hartley Legacy Foundation (SHLF) 10K... https://t.co/aUtjyAn25u
See you soon @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas ! Just finished my shakeout run in #Vancouver and my next run will be on the #StripAtNight - it will be EPIC! #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/AwmNej73rK
Join me on the @ClimateRace & run to support solar power projects. I just ran 2.96km to benefit the cause & if you want, you can sponsor me here: https://t.co/9pb5alSADx https://t.co/yFamMgc6Lt

If you love @nuunhydration and telling people about it, you can apply to become a Nuun Ambassador now! They're taking applications until November 19th so get yours in! Let's fill some of these gaps on this map! #nuunlife #teamnuun #Vancouver #Canada https://t.co/ee6UMvUwTi https://t.co/b49ylddSyG

The @HNLmarathon is on my list of to-do races! If you can swing it this year, save 20% on your race entry with code "BIBRAVEHNL” - the race is on December 10th. #BibChat #honolulumarathon https://t.co/DEEbV4Nj7f https://t.co/kL3oXn3hNq

Love my @BocoGear run hats especially on rainy races like last month's @SeawallRace - check out the review on my blog and see my #boco hat collection 😄 #bibchat #bocolove #bocogear #runninggear https://t.co/NUrJc1ChJQ https://t.co/FZvrbv9Cb2

Excited to run my first @KajaksTrack Icebreaker 8k with the @westvanrun crew! A flat, fun and fast 8k in the heart of Steveston. Who wants to join me? #bibchat #westvanrun #wvrc #RichmondBC https://t.co/3d26TXor7U https://t.co/SBE5pP4H2l

@RunningEJo @RunRocknRoll You should go to their website and print your confirmation sheet. You need it to get your bib. I think everything else is on there too. https://t.co/YTFLoFth6t

@RunRocknRoll Hi there. FYI I am registered for #RnRVegas this weekend but never received the recent confirmation email. Am wondering if others experienced the same too. I only found out about printing the confirmation sheet on your website. Heads up :)
